description:
A fateful phone call shakes up the normal routine in the Sanzenin household. Is it an invitation from outer space? Area 51 is a military base that routinely attracts gray/secretive missions, UFOs and other un-worldly things. Nagi is intent on going there, but Maria says it’s too dangerous to go. Hayate laughs at Nagi who knows very little about the world. And so the story begins…
Source: crunchyroll
